text: Bennington is a town in Bennington County, Vermont, in the United States. It is one of two shire towns (county seats) of the county, the other being Manchester.Title 24, Part I, Chapter 1, ยง3, Vermont Statutes. Accessed 2007-11-01. The population is 15,333, as of the 2020 US Census. Bennington is the most populous town in southern Vermont. ==References== Category:County seats in Vermont Category:Towns in Vermont
title: Bennington, Vermont
